item.title: At conference
item.dc:creator: vertoh
item.content:encoded: CHELYABINSK NOVEMBER 26: Audience listening to the speaker at Agricultural Conference Divident Extreme New Offer of Syngenta Company, November 26, 2009 in Hotel Park City, Chelyabinsk, Russia.

item.title: Schedule
item.dc:creator: vertoh
item.content:encoded:
This is the schedule. Here your attendees will be able to flick through the content of your event.
Sessions could be quickly skimmed by date, location or track.
If you run events with complex schedules Vertoh is the perfect solution to display all your sessions in one elegant solution.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Don't Miss Any of our Sessions

item.title: All Our Amazing Speakers
item.dc:creator: vertoh
item.content:encoded: This is an overview of all the speakers of your event, you can split them up into up to 3 groups. You can feature Keynotes or top performers at the top of the page. The speakers for this event will deliver amazing speeches. You can click on each speaker profile to look at their complete profile. Attendees will be able to learn more about their talk and bio. This speaker page is completely responsive and can be read beautifully on mobiles. You can add links on this page as it pleases you.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Learn how you can drive sales to your product

item.title: Our Venue
item.dc:creator: vertoh
item.content:encoded:
Have a look at our beautiful venue. It is a fantastic place to visit and great hotel to host you. Efficiently unleash cross-media information without cross-media value. Quickly maximize timely deliverables for real-time schemas. Dramatically maintain clicks-and-mortar solutions without functional solutions.  

Our Hosting City

In our amazing hosting city, entertainment is great! Have fun in the amazing streets of our hosting city. Efficiently unleash cross-media information without cross-media value. Quickly maximize timely deliverables for real-time schemas. Dramatically maintain clicks-and-mortar solutions without functional solutions.  

Getting Here

Our venue is located in the heart of the City is accessible by rail, road and subway. By Subway We are within walking distance from a number of Subway stations, the closest being Torten, Calling and Nana. To plan your journey and for up to date travel information, visit the Subway official website By Rail The nearest train stations are Candelier and Porter. By Bus Bus Route 393/b runs directly past our venue along Central Street. We are easily accessible by bus from around the city. Plan your journey using the city interactive scheduling service By Bycicle Cycle racks are available at the entrance to the Car Park and helmets and equipment can be left in our free cloakrooms. By Car Our Venue is clearly sign-posted and has four car parks on Central Street.
